general_advisory: As per extended range of forecast received from IMD, fairly widespread to widespread rain/thundershower is very likely over districts of Odisha during next week (2nd to 8th August 2024) and overall rainfall activity likely to be slightly above normal with possibility of isolated heavy to very heavy rain over the districts of Odisha during next week. In view of above forecast, farmers advised to withhold intercultural operation, top dressing and application of pesticides for next three days. Considering the realized and anticipated rainfall, farmers are advised to complete the transplanting of paddy where the field has been ready. Make arrangements for draining out excess water from the field of pulses, maize, groundnut, and vegetables. Prepare bund for conserving rainwater inside the field, specifically in upland conditions. Due to the prevailing cloudy weather associated with high humidity, regular monitoring for the occurrence of insects and diseases in crops is highly recommended. SMS Advisory: Always apply the recommended dose of pesticides by following necessary safety measures.

advisory: Weed Management: Apply Fenoxaprop-p-ethyl 10% EC (Whipsuper) @240-260 ml/acre by mixing with 200 liters of water at 25-30 DAS in upland condition.

In medium and lowland condition, where herbicide is not applied for weed control, Beushening may be done after the accumulation of sufficient water (at least 7-10cm standing water) in the field & proper plant population to be maintained (Khelua).
Nutrient Management: Apply 26 kg urea/acre after weeding in upland condition and 36 kg urea/acre after beushening in medium and lowland condition as top dressing.

Recommended dose of Fertilizer: Apply 26 kg DAP + 10 kg MOP + 10 kg ZnSO4 in upland condition and 35 kg DAP + 13 kg MOP + 10 kg ZnSO4 per acre in medium and lowland condition as basal application. In boron deficient soil apply borax @2kg/ac during final land preparation.
Transplanting of 20-25 days old seedlings is recommended @2-3 seedlings/hill at a spacing of 20x15 cm.
Weed Management: Apply granular herbicide Bensulfuron methyl 0.6% + Pretilachlor 6% GR (Londax Power) @4 kg/acre by mixing with 20 kg of sand at 1-3 days after transplanting.
Apply Pyrazosulfuron ethyl 10% WP @100g/ac by mixing with 200 liters of water as an early post emergence herbicide.

If pre-emergence herbicide has not been applied then apply Bispyribac sodium 10% SC (Nominee gold) @120ml/acre by mixing with 200 liters of water at 15-20 DAT. For further information, contact the IMD, Bhubaneswar, Tel.#0674-2596116.
